hero.name: Kelvin M. Mwau
hero.description: I'm a passionate Software Engineer hailing from Nairobi, Kenya, specializing in Java (Spring), Php (Codeigniter|Laravel), and RPA (Power Automate|UIPATH) with a keen interest in DevSecOps. Exploring new horizons and continuous learning are my driving forces. With a rich portfolio showcasing a myriad of projects, you're invited to delve into the details in the dedicated portfolio section of this website. I am eagerly anticipating exciting opportunities and challenges ahead. Let's embark on this journey together!

about.title: UNLEASHING INNOVATION THROUGH SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
about.description: Greetings! I'm Kelvin, a passionate full-stack developer with over 8 years of experience in crafting remarkable web and app solutions. My journey involves delving deep into the realms of Java, JavaScript, Python, PHP, and Kotlin. Proficient in frameworks like Spring Boot, ReactJS, Angular, and Node.js, I strive to create impactful solutions that resonate in the world of software development.
highlights: Successfully led a team in developing a cutting-edge mobile app for [Company Name].
Completed [Certification] to stay ahead in the ever-evolving tech landscape.

companyDescription: Developed and managed SOA integrations using webservices technologies (SOAP, REST, UDDI, WSDL).
Implemented a DevOps CI/CD pipeline with Peer Programming, Version Control (TFS and Git), Jenkins, and TIBCO TEA for service hosting.
Developed Backend applications in Java spring boot and PHP Laravel using a React JS front end, and Oracle or MySQL databases.
Enhanced, tested, and digitized BPMS workflows using process maker.
achievements: Successfully implemented a CI/CD pipeline, reducing deployment time by 30%.
Led the development of a critical SOA integration project, ensuring seamless communication between systems.

companyDescription: Reviewed current systems, monitored performance, and maintained systems to ensure efficiency and compliance with organization policies (PCIDSS) and procedures.
Managed existing systems, including database indexing and optimization.
Collaborated with other developers, quality assurance, and DevOps Officers.
achievements: Successfully optimized database indexes, improving overall system performance by 20%.

companyDescription: Led software development projects using Java, PHP, React JS, Python, and mobile app development for Android and hybrid platforms.
Managed databases (Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, SQL Server).
Implemented and managed end-to-end Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) processes utilizing Git, Jenkins, and Terraform.
Utilized Docker for containerization and Kubernetes for orchestration, ensuring efficient management and scalability of applications.
achievements: Successfully implemented CI/CD processes, reducing deployment cycles by 25%.
Pioneered containerization using Docker, leading to improved application scalability.

companyDescription: Provided full support, configuration, maintenance, and upgrades for both cloud and physical/virtual environments (Linux and Windows).

allTestimonial.reviewText: Muli's attention to detail and commitment to quality were instrumental in our project's success. His ability to code efficiently and troubleshoot issues made a significant impact. It was a great experience working alongside him

Kelvin is a highly skilled and experienced software developer. He is always willing to go the extra mile to get the job done and are always looking for ways to improve our systems. Kelvin is also a great team player and is always willing to help others. I highly recommend Kelvin for any software development position.

Working with Kelvin is a pleasure. His technical knowledge and collaborative approach made our projects run smoothly. He's a team player, always ready to share insights and support team members. I look forward to future collaborations with him.

Kelvin delivered a solution that exceeded our expectations. His ability to understand our needs and translate them into a user-friendly application was impressive. We're grateful for his dedication to our project's success.
